messages.content: Context: User: Prepare a guide on a placeholder initiative titled 'Northwind guide: a placeholder initiative' and export as docx. Assistant: Thanks. Keep it minimal or add more detail? User: Three sections and brief bullets.

Title: Northwind guide: a placeholder initiative Sections: - Overview: Context: this is a guide for Northwind. Audience: the test committee. - Goals: Assumptions are placeholders for now. Focus on clarity over detail. - Risks: Risk: scope drift. Follow-up: refine after review.
